title: The Andy Smithson Series: Books 1, 2, and 3 (Young Adult Epic Fantasy Bundle) (Andy Smithson Series Boxset)
features: Video games canâ€™t train you to fight dragons!
3 books. Nearly 700 pages of action. Save over 40% when you buy the box set!

Medieval and modern-day collide when gamer Andy Smithson is whisked away to the magical land of Oomaldee, where dragons, giants, and deadly curses lurk around every corner.Trading his controller for a sword of legend, Andy embarks upon several epic quests to break a centuries-old curse oppressing the land. It isn't chance that plunges him into the adventure though, for he soon discovers his ancestors are behind the curse. The Andy Smithson series is a coming-of-age, epic fantasy adventure by USA Today Bestselling author L. R. W. Lee featuring fast-paced action, sword fights, laugh-out-loud humor, with a few life lessons thrown in. It's perfect for fans of Eragon, Fablehaven, Percy Jackson, Magemother, and Aster Wood!
Grab your copy now. Save 40% over buying each book separately. Scroll up and buy it today!
description: Amazon readers love this series - over 300 reviews of 5* and 4*
Praise for L. R. W. Lee

"Fun, exciting, and mysterious. I enjoyed everything from the ominous vulture men, to the foggy, cursed land of Oomaldee." - 13-year-old Amazon Reviewer"As a parent, I love that it brings up issues of truth, honesty, integrity, and perseverance." - Amazon Reviewer"Action and adventure, with quite a bit of humor." - Editor, SP Reviews
Kirkus raves: "...its appealing protagonist and high personal stakes provide an excellent read for young fantasy fans."
"I'm ten, and I think this is a wonderful adventure novel." - 10-year-old Amazon Reviewer"A great world, an intriguing story with unexpected twists that leave you wanting more." - Amazon Reviewer
Thirteen-year-old Amazon Reviewer says, "One of my favorite series."

"Adventure with life lessons." - Amazon Reviewer"I couldn't stop reading!" - Amazon Reviewer"A wonderful bit of fiction that transcends the cynicism and blurry lines of so many other works and harkens back to the classic, enduring tales of good and evil, right and wrong, and deep character change." - Amazon Reviewer"I absolutely love it and just ordered a paperback copy as I had been reading online. It's kind of like Harry Potter meets C.S. Lewis. Super entertaining, yet super inspirational at the same time!!!" - Amazon Reviewer
